original: krishna pi sh'a tsi s'a ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: krishna pi sh'a tsi s'a ra s'a dha nam /

translated: In Tibetan:反The Essence of the Black Piﾅ崙…a Practice反Homage to Yamﾄ〉i.

original: sha za nag po snying po'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sha za nag po snying po'i sgrub thabs /
translated: Homage to K盪帋ｹ｣盪㌢ Piﾅ崙…a.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the charnel ground.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the forest.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the house.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the village.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the town.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the city.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the country.

original: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo /
translated: Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the mountain.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the river.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the lake.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the ocean.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the sky.

original: na mo krishna pi sh'a tsa ye sa ra sa ra hi ri hi ri a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha gri h'u pi na dam pi sh'a tsa sv'a h'a /反nyal ba'i dus su sgo'i steng du khri stan la zan lhag rdog po gcig @158a * //
analyzed: na mo krishna pi sh'a tsa ye sa ra sa ra hi ri hi ri a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha gri h'u pi na dam pi sh'a tsa sv'a h'a / nyal ba'i dus su sgo'i steng du khri stan la zan lhag rdog po gcig @158a * //
translated: Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the earth.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the house.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the village.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the town.

original: la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa dbul lo //反zla gcig rdzogs nas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa dbul lo // zla gcig rdzogs nas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the city.

analyzed: grub nas nyi ma re re la don nyi shu rtsa lnga ster ro //
translated: Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the country.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the mountain.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the river.反Homage, homage to the piﾅ崙…a who dwells in the lake.

original: grub zin nas tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi 'am nyi shu dgu la zan lhag rdog po gcig la sngags bzlas la dbul lo zhes so //
